body:
Ok... so i'm here to say that im leaving the server... and minecraft... and i have some words to say:

This was one of the first servers i joined and where i had the most nice experiences. I have to say thanks to some people of this awesome community (I'm not going to tell the names because they are a lot XD).
I joined this server when it was MCZone and watching how it grown up... it's awesome.
I'm coming sometimes to play and revive old and epic moments.
I wanted to post some photos when i joined the server or at the start of avicus, but i accidentally deleted my .minecraft and... well, you guys know it.

And sorry if you don't understand anything of this because of my english, but I speak spanish and that's the best i can do.

BYEEEE EVERYONE!!!!! :D And have fun playing in this awesome server!!!

I will end this with the thing i said when i joined the server: 

-Xxrafoxx was knocked out of the world by (Insert name here)
-Xxrafoxx: hacker noob

PD: I think i said that XD i personally can't remember.

title: Some words to say...

replies.body: Altho i never saw u, it sad 2 c u go.  Bye bae! </3
